Summary: 4 glowing lights appeared in the sky two different times within 10 minutes.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Gorman
There were no other sightings in Gorman on or around August 31st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my dad's deer camp In Texas. He & I were standing around talking. The appearance of the 4 bright red-orange lights in the sky. I am not sure, my first thought were flares. There were 4 lights that appeared simultaneously in a vertical formation. The second time the lights appeared, they appeared horizontally but sequentially. Disbelief and Curiosity. They faded out.
